mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_quant_stock_signal ( wind_code, strategy_id, signal_type, trigger_price, signal_time, trade_date, show_status, risk_snapshot, status ) VALUES ( #{windCode}, #{strategyId}, #{signalType}, #{triggerPrice}, #{signalTime}, #{tradeDate}, #{showStatus}, #{riskSnapshot}, IFNULL(#{status}, 1) ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE trigger_price = VALUES(trigger_price), show_status = VALUES(show_status), risk_snapshot = VALUES(risk_snapshot), update_time = NOW()
